net.javachallenge.api

Interface Squad


  • public interface Squad
    The Squad interface represents a squad of robots in the game. Note that this interface is immutable, thus, its object stores the information of just this turn and will not be updated.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TrianglePoint getCurrentLocation()
      Returns the current location of the squad.
      TrianglePoint getDestinationLocation()
      Returns the destination of the squad.
      int getOwnerId()
      Returns the id of the owner of the squad.
      java.util.ArrayList<TrianglePoint> getPath()
      Returns the path of the squad from the current location to the destination as a copied mutable list.
      int getRobot()
      Returns the number of robots in the squad.
